haReport:
This mission was flown by:
SLt Iosif Batishchev
SLt Artur Primakov
Lt Artur Pugin
Szt Russ Test

 The mission was flown from Ivanovskaya aerodrome.

Claim Status: 
On 01/05/1943 near Gladkovskaya.
A MC.202 ser.VIII of 21 Gruppo Caccia was brought down by Artur Primakov of 16th Guards Fighter Air Regiment.
Bernaba Rossetti was not injured.
Artur Primakov was  flying a P-39L-1.

On 01/05/1943 near Varenikovskaya.
A MC.202 ser.VIII of 21 Gruppo Caccia was brought down by Russ Test of 16th Guards Fighter Air Regiment.
Nuccio Monti was not injured.
Russ Test was  flying a P-39L-1.

On 01/05/1943 near Gladkovskaya.
A MC.202 ser.VIII of 21 Gruppo Caccia was brought down by Artur Pugin of 16th Guards Fighter Air Regiment.
Biagio Rossetti was not injured.
Artur Pugin was  flying a P-39L-1.


Pilots lost were: 
    SLt Iosif Batishchev: Captured
    Szt Russ Test: Seriously Wounded
